formatted_address: 5 Thong Soon Avenue, Springleaf Garden, Singapore 787433
name: Ancient Dynasty Massage & Spa (Upper Thomson)

reviews.text: I have come across this spa and decided to try out. I had 90minutes full body massage and its was very good experience. No hard-selling at all. Chilled and relaxing environment. I will recommend this place. üëçüèª

My coworker raved about their essential oil selection, so I had high expectations for my visit. From lavender to eucalyptus, I took my time sniffing each blend until I found the perfect match for my mood. The resulting massage felt personalized and deeply comforting, making me forget all about the traffic jam I navigated to get there.

I‚Äôve been to many spas, but this one has a uniquely calming environment that drew me in the moment I stepped through the door. The gentle music paired perfectly with the therapist‚Äôs skilled hands, and I felt every knot in my shoulders dissolve. Later, they even offered me a cup of fragrant ginger tea that rounded out an already delightful session.

I‚Äôm someone who usually favors strong massages, so I was delighted when the masseuse skillfully applied the right amount of pressure. She regularly checked in on me to ensure everything felt comfortable, which made me feel well taken care of. By the time we finished, my back felt brand-new.

I have extremely sensitive skin, so I appreciated the staff‚Äôs openness to discussing the massage oils. They reassured me by showing me the ingredients and doing a quick skin test. This attention to detail is something I rarely find, and it made the experience worry-free.
